amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 116-330 to direct NOAA to consider the potential of a living shoreline project to support the resiliency of military communities when developing criteria for grant applications.
amendment.purpose: Amendment directs NOAA to consider the potential of a living shoreline project to support the resiliency of military communities when developing criteria for grant applications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luria amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 368 - 51 (Roll no. 665).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mrs. Luria.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luria amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 368 - 51 (Roll no. 665).
